title: Varus
body: Can we get a Varus buff, i've been playing alot of him recently and find him to be really weak and just not up there with the other adc's

replies.body:
What keystone do you give Varus? If I use thunderlords and have a few AD runes on, two auto's and a Q seem to do so much in term's of trading.

Perhaps it isn't as effective as I think though.
He's not a dueling ADC, he's a poking-focused one. Don't fight people straight up expecting to win.
yeah ive learned now that you get them low with q then all in, ty for the advice still! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=Hwarryun,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=v93NJtzK,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-24T17:33:04.890+0000)
>
> yeah ive learned now that you get them low with q then all in, ty for the advice still! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

with the right build and masteries {{champion:110}} can provide a good amount of burst damage with his kit if you land Q E R and get off the bonus damage with blight stacks.
not unless he is picked in worlds. riot balances around that.
